Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-25629 affecting package python-gevent for versions less than 23.9.1-4
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-25629 affecting package python-gevent for versions less than 23.9.1-4. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package python-gevent is earlier than 23.9.1-4, affected by CVE-2024-25629
